title: Speed boots/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Speed_boots "Speed boots")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[   [![Combat boots.png](/images/1/15/Combat_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Combat_boots.png) [![Jungle boots.png](/images/f/fc/Jungle_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Jungle_boots.png) [![Hiking boots.png](/images/b/bc/Hiking_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Hiking_boots.png) [![Mud boots.png](/images/d/de/Mud_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Mud_boots.png) [![Buckled boots.png](/images/5/59/Buckled_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Buckled_boots.png) [![Riding boots.png](/images/4/42/Riding_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Riding_boots.png) [![Snow boots.png](/images/f/fe/Snow_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Snow_boots.png)***速度靴 |                                                                                                                  |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                  |
| 装备槽位                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | [靴子](/wiki/%E9%9D%B4%E5%AD%90 "靴子")                                                                              |
| AC                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [1](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)")  |
| 特殊效果                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | - [加速](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%A0%E9%80%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "加速 (page does not exist)")                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                  |
| 基础价                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | 50 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                           |
| 重量                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [20](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                     |
| 材料                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")                     |

**速度靴**（speed boots）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[靴子](/wiki/%E9%9D%B4%E5%AD%90 "靴子")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它是一种[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")靴子，由[皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 消息](#.E6.B6.88.E6.81.AF)

- [6 Variants](#Variants)

  - [6.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [6.2 NetHack brass](#NetHack_brass)
  - [6.3 GruntHack](#GruntHack)
  - [6.4 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [6.5 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [6.6 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [6.7 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

在[星界位面](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C%E4%BD%8D%E9%9D%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界位面 (page does not exist)")生成的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")有约8.01%的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")速度靴[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-mk_mplayer_armor-3)。

## 描述

速度靴的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，穿戴时提供[外在](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%96%E5%9C%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "外在 (page does not exist)")的[加速](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%A0%E9%80%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "加速 (page does not exist)")特质。若在穿上或脱下速度靴时角色的速度发生了变化，则速度靴会被[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")。

穿戴速度靴会使得角色的常态速度+6，且每回合有1⁄3的概率使角色的速度在当回合内再+6。换句话说，角色的常态速度从12提升到18（提升到初始速度的150%，每2回合可行动3次），且每回合有1⁄3的概率提升到24（初始速度的200%，一回合可行动2次）——此时角色的平均速度是20（初始速度的167%，每3回合可行动5次）。

怪物也可穿戴速度靴，其获得的效果与[加速怪物魔杖](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%A0%E9%80%9F%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E9%AD%94%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "加速怪物魔杖 (page does not exist)")、[加速药水](/wiki/%E5%8A%A0%E9%80%9F%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4 "加速药水")和[自我加速](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E6%88%91%E5%8A%A0%E9%80%9F%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E6%B3%95%E6%9C%AF%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自我加速（怪物法术） (page does not exist)")[怪物法术](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E6%B3%95%E6%9C%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物法术 (page does not exist)")相同。穿戴速度靴[骑乘](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E4%B9%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑乘 (page does not exist)")坐骑不会影响坐骑的速度。

## 策略

速度靴是唯一能永久提供外在快速特质的来源，因此是[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")的热门选择。外在快速对于所有角色而言都是质的提升，而且比内在快速的提升更高——每回合额外的行动机会使得你可以更高效地输出伤害，也能更容易从战斗中逃脱、使用“[风筝](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%8E%E7%AD%9D\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "风筝 (page does not exist)")”战术或从怪物群中穿过并避免被围堵。受祝福的定形的+2或+3速度靴是前期[许愿](/index.php?title=%E8%AE%B8%E6%84%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "许愿 (page does not exist)")的常见选择，虽然根据实际情况，有时[灰色或银色](/index.php?title=%E7%81%B0%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2VS%E9%93%B6%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "灰龙鳞甲VS银龙鳞甲 (page does not exist)")[龙鳞甲](/wiki/%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2 "龙鳞甲")更合适。

速度靴对于人形宠物的效果很有限——大多数此类宠物都能使用魔杖和药水，有些怪物通过施法也能给自己加速。外在速度对于常使用骑乘的玩家来说也不是非常必要——对于他们来说，利用可以令坐骑[跳跃](/index.php?title=%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "跳跃 (page does not exist)")的[跳跃靴](/wiki/%E8%B7%B3%E8%B7%83%E9%9D%B4 "跳跃靴")能够更高效地移动，而[水上步靴](/wiki/%E6%B0%B4%E4%B8%8A%E6%AD%A5%E9%9D%B4 "水上步靴")则能让自身可以在水面上安全地下马。请注意坐骑不是不死的，如果你因意外失去了坐骑，做好徒步继续旅程的准备。

在计回合的[速通](/index.php?title=%E9%80%9F%E9%80%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "速通 (page does not exist)")中，速度靴是关键道具，因为它可以让玩家在一回合内做更多的事。[自我变形](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E6%88%91%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自我变形 (page does not exist)")为[空气元素](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%BA%E6%B0%94%E5%85%83%E7%B4%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "空气元素 (page does not exist)")可以更快地行动，但你不能在该形态下穿戴靴子。

## 历史

速度靴最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## 消息

- 你感觉自己的速度加快了。（You feel yourself speed up.）

  你在普通速度下穿上速度靴。

- 你感觉自己加快得多一些了。（You feel yourself speed up a bit more.）

  你在自身具有快速特质的情况下穿上速度靴。

- 你的快速感觉<更/不>自然了。（Your quickness feels \<more/less> natural.）

  你在穿戴速度靴时获得/失去内在快速特质。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Speed_boots/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [Whisperfeet](/wiki/Whisperfeet "Whisperfeet") is an artifact pair of speed boots that [acts as a luckstone](/wiki/Luck_item "Luck item") and confers [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth") when worn, and acts as the guaranteed first sacrifice gift for [Tourists](/wiki/Tourist "Tourist").

The [black market](/wiki/Black_market_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Black market (SLASH'EM)") shopkeeper, One-Eyed Sam, is always generated wearing an enchanted pair of speed boots; a guaranteed pair of speed boots also appears in [The Spider Caves](/wiki/The_Spider_Caves "The Spider Caves").

Due to the new [create pool](/wiki/Create_pool "Create pool") spell that monsters will cast, non-flying characters may prefer [water walking boots](/wiki/Water_walking_boots "Water walking boots") to speed boots as their primary boots of choice in the late game.

### NetHack brass

In [NetHack brass](/wiki/NetHack_brass "NetHack brass"), speed boots provide a boost to speed that can stack with other sources of speed, rather than setting the character's speed to very fast.

### GruntHack

In [GruntHack](/wiki/GruntHack "GruntHack"), speed boots are generally less desirable since other boots and all types of armor can have the speed property, providing more sources of extrinsic speed - for example, "blessed greased fixed +3 [dragonhide](/wiki/Dragonhide "Dragonhide") water walking boots of speed" is a common wish target for the boots slot.

Monsters that are given a wish and are not already fast may wish for a blessed, [greased](/wiki/Greased "Greased") and fixed +3 pair of speed boots.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the [black market](/wiki/Black_market_\(UnNetHack\) "Black market (UnNetHack)") shopkeeper One-Eyed Sam is generated with an enchanted pair of speed boots as in SLASH'EM.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), Whisperfeet is present as a chaotic artifact pair of speed boots that is not tied to any specific role.

[Asmodeus](/index.php?title=Asmodeus_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Asmodeus (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") will always generate with speed boots, and [xorn monks](/wiki/Xorn_monk "Xorn monk") have a 1⁄144 chance of generating with speed boots.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [centaurs](/wiki/Centaur_\(starting_race\) "Centaur (starting race)") and [tortles](/wiki/Tortle_\(starting_race\) "Tortle (starting race)") cannot wear speed boots or any kind of footwear - the [helm of speed](/wiki/Helm_of_speed "Helm of speed") is an alternative source of speed that they can wear.

A typical wish for characters seeking a speed source that are not centaurs or tortles is "blessed greased fixed +3 dragonhide speed boots". A monster that is given a wish may wish for a blessed, [greased](/wiki/Greased "Greased") and fixed pair of speed boots enchanted from +1 to +4 if they are not already fast and can wear boots.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") details above, [Duri](/wiki/Duri "Duri") generates with a pair of speed boots.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 514](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/objects.c#L514)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 134](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L134)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-mk_mplayer_armor_3-0) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L294)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Speed boots/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Speed boots
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[         
速度靴
外观 随机
装备槽位 靴子
AC 1
特殊效果
  • 加速
基础价 50 zm
重量 20
材料 皮革

速度靴（speed boots）是NetHack中的一种靴子类防具。它是一种魔法靴子，由皮革制成，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 消息
  • 6 Variants
    • 6.1 SLASH'EM
    • 6.2 NetHack brass
    • 6.3 GruntHack
    • 6.4 UnNetHack
    • 6.5 dNetHack
    • 6.6 EvilHack
    • 6.7 SlashTHEM
  • 7 引用及注释

生成

在星界位面生成的玩家怪物有约8.01%的概率携带速度靴[2][3]。

描述

速度靴的基础AC加成为1，穿戴时提供外在的加速特质。若在穿上或脱下速度靴时角色的速度发生了变化，则速度靴会被自动鉴定。

穿戴速度靴会使得角色的常态速度+6，且每回合有1⁄3的概率使角色的速度在当回合内再+6。换句话说，角色的常态速度从12提升到18（提升到初始速度的150%，每2回合可行动3次），且每回合有1⁄3的概率提升到24（初始速度的200%，一回合可行动2次）——此时角色的平均速度是20（初始速度的167%，每3回合可行动5次）。

怪物也可穿戴速度靴，其获得的效果与加速怪物魔杖、加速药水和自我加速怪物法术相同。穿戴速度靴骑乘坐骑不会影响坐骑的速度。

策略

速度靴是唯一能永久提供外在快速特质的来源，因此是飞升套件的热门选择。外在快速对于所有角色而言都是质的提升，而且比内在快速的提升更高——每回合额外的行动机会使得你可以更高效地输出伤害，也能更容易从战斗中逃脱、使用“风筝”战术或从怪物群中穿过并避免被围堵。受祝福的定形的+2或+3速度靴是前期许愿的常见选择，虽然根据实际情况，有时灰色或银色龙鳞甲更合适。

速度靴对于人形宠物的效果很有限——大多数此类宠物都能使用魔杖和药水，有些怪物通过施法也能给自己加速。外在速度对于常使用骑乘的玩家来说也不是非常必要——对于他们来说，利用可以令坐骑跳跃的跳跃靴能够更高效地移动，而水上步靴则能让自身可以在水面上安全地下马。请注意坐骑不是不死的，如果你因意外失去了坐骑，做好徒步继续旅程的准备。

在计回合的速通中，速度靴是关键道具，因为它可以让玩家在一回合内做更多的事。自我变形为空气元素可以更快地行动，但你不能在该形态下穿戴靴子。

历史

速度靴最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

消息

你感觉自己的速度加快了。（You feel yourself speed up.）
你在普通速度下穿上速度靴。
你感觉自己加快得多一些了。（You feel yourself speed up a bit more.）
你在自身具有快速特质的情况下穿上速度靴。
你的快速感觉<更/不>自然了。（Your quickness feels <more/less> natural.）
你在穿戴速度靴时获得/失去内在快速特质。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, Whisperfeet is an artifact pair of speed boots that acts as a luckstone and confers stealth when worn, and acts as the guaranteed first sacrifice gift for Tourists.

The black market shopkeeper, One-Eyed Sam, is always generated wearing an enchanted pair of speed boots; a guaranteed pair of speed boots also appears in The Spider Caves.

Due to the new create pool spell that monsters will cast, non-flying characters may prefer water walking boots to speed boots as their primary boots of choice in the late game.

NetHack brass

In NetHack brass, speed boots provide a boost to speed that can stack with other sources of speed, rather than setting the character's speed to very fast.

GruntHack

In GruntHack, speed boots are generally less desirable since other boots and all types of armor can have the speed property, providing more sources of extrinsic speed - for example, "blessed greased fixed +3 dragonhide water walking boots of speed" is a common wish target for the boots slot.

Monsters that are given a wish and are not already fast may wish for a blessed, greased and fixed +3 pair of speed boots.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, the black market shopkeeper One-Eyed Sam is generated with an enchanted pair of speed boots as in SLASH'EM.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, Whisperfeet is present as a chaotic artifact pair of speed boots that is not tied to any specific role.

Asmodeus will always generate with speed boots, and xorn monks have a 1⁄144 chance of generating with speed boots.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, centaurs and tortles cannot wear speed boots or any kind of footwear - the helm of speed is an alternative source of speed that they can wear.

A typical wish for characters seeking a speed source that are not centaurs or tortles is "blessed greased fixed +3 dragonhide speed boots". A monster that is given a wish may wish for a blessed, greased and fixed pair of speed boots enchanted from +1 to +4 if they are not already fast and can wear boots.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details above, Duri generates with a pair of speed boots.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 514
  2. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 134
  3. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294

{{needhelp/zh-CN}} {{languages}} {{armor/zh-CN |top={{boots top}} |name=速度靴 |appearance={{random appearance/zh-CN}} |slot=靴子 |ac=1 |special=
  • [[加速]]
|cost=50 |weight=20 |material=皮革 }} '''速度靴'''（speed boots）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[靴子]]类[[防具]]。它是一种[[魔法物品|魔法]]靴子，由[[皮革]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|514|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 生成 == 在[[星界位面]]生成的[[玩家怪物]]有约8.01%的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]速度靴{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|134|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|294|version=NetHack 3.6.7|name=mk_mplayer_armor}}。 == 描述 == 速度靴的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，穿戴时提供[[外在]]的[[加速]]特质。若在穿上或脱下速度靴时角色的速度发生了变化，则速度靴会被[[自动鉴定]]。 穿戴速度靴会使得角色的常态速度+6，且每回合有{{frac|3}}的概率使角色的速度在当回合内再+6。换句话说，角色的常态速度从12提升到18（提升到初始速度的150%，每2回合可行动3次），且每回合有{{frac|3}}的概率提升到24（初始速度的200%，一回合可行动2次）——此时角色的平均速度是20（初始速度的167%，每3回合可行动5次）。 怪物也可穿戴速度靴，其获得的效果与[[加速怪物魔杖]]、[[加速药水]]和[[自我加速（怪物法术）|自我加速]][[怪物法术]]相同。穿戴速度靴[[骑乘]]坐骑不会影响坐骑的速度。 == 策略 == 速度靴是唯一能永久提供外在快速特质的来源，因此是[[飞升套件]]的热门选择。外在快速对于所有角色而言都是质的提升，而且比内在快速的提升更高——每回合额外的行动机会使得你可以更高效地输出伤害，也能更容易从战斗中逃脱、使用“[[风筝]]”战术或从怪物群中穿过并避免被围堵。受祝福的定形的+2或+3速度靴是前期[[许愿]]的常见选择，虽然根据实际情况，有时[[灰龙鳞甲VS银龙鳞甲|灰色或银色]][[龙鳞甲]]更合适。 速度靴对于人形宠物的效果很有限——大多数此类宠物都能使用魔杖和药水，有些怪物通过施法也能给自己加速。外在速度对于常使用骑乘的玩家来说也不是非常必要——对于他们来说，利用可以令坐骑[[跳跃]]的[[跳跃靴]]能够更高效地移动，而[[水上步靴]]则能让自身可以在水面上安全地下马。请注意坐骑不是不死的，如果你因意外失去了坐骑，做好徒步继续旅程的准备。 在计回合的[[速通]]中，速度靴是关键道具，因为它可以让玩家在一回合内做更多的事。[[自我变形]]为[[空气元素]]可以更快地行动，但你不能在该形态下穿戴靴子。 == 历史 == 速度靴最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。 == 消息 == {{message/zh-CN|你感觉自己的速度加快了。|你在普通速度下穿上速度靴。|You feel yourself speed up.}} {{message/zh-CN|你感觉自己加快得多一些了。|你在自身具有快速特质的情况下穿上速度靴。|You feel yourself speed up a bit more.}} {{message/zh-CN|你的快速感觉<更/不>自然了。|你在穿戴速度靴时获得/失去内在快速特质。|Your quickness feels natural.}} ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], [[Whisperfeet]] is an artifact pair of speed boots that [[Luck item|acts as a luckstone]] and confers [[stealth]] when worn, and acts as the guaranteed first sacrifice gift for [[Tourist]]s. The [[Black market (SLASH'EM)|black market]] shopkeeper, One-Eyed Sam, is always generated wearing an enchanted pair of speed boots; a guaranteed pair of speed boots also appears in [[The Spider Caves]]. Due to the new [[create pool]] spell that monsters will cast, non-flying characters may prefer [[water walking boots]] to speed boots as their primary boots of choice in the late game. ===NetHack brass=== In [[NetHack brass]], speed boots provide a boost to speed that can stack with other sources of speed, rather than setting the character's speed to very fast. ===GruntHack=== In [[GruntHack]], speed boots are generally less desirable since other boots and all types of armor can have the speed property, providing more sources of extrinsic speed - for example, "blessed greased fixed +3 [[dragonhide]] water walking boots of speed" is a common wish target for the boots slot. Monsters that are given a wish and are not already fast may wish for a blessed, [[greased]] and fixed +3 pair of speed boots. ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], the [[Black market (UnNetHack)|black market]] shopkeeper One-Eyed Sam is generated with an enchanted pair of speed boots as in SLASH'EM. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], Whisperfeet is present as a chaotic artifact pair of speed boots that is not tied to any specific role. [[Asmodeus (dNetHack)|Asmodeus]] will always generate with speed boots, and [[xorn monk]]s have a {{frac|144}} chance of generating with speed boots. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], [[Centaur (starting race)|centaurs]] and [[Tortle (starting race)|tortles]] cannot wear speed boots or any kind of footwear - the [[helm of speed]] is an alternative source of speed that they can wear. A typical wish for characters seeking a speed source that are not centaurs or tortles is "blessed greased fixed +3 dragonhide speed boots". A monster that is given a wish may wish for a blessed, [[greased]] and fixed pair of speed boots enchanted from +1 to +4 if they are not already fast and can wear boots. ===SlashTHEM=== In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to [[SLASH'EM]] details above, [[Duri]] generates with a pair of speed boots. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Boots/zh-CN|SUDUXUE]]
